short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The JobTetris Chrome extension allows you to quickly save roles to your JobTetris to track your progress and manage your job search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The JobTetris Chrome extension allows you to quickly save job ads from your favourite Job boards to your JobTetris dashboard, and track your progress and manage your job search.
 
JobTetris is a platform to connect Job Seekers, Recruitment Agencies and Employers throughout the hiring process, while enabling you to keep your data private and secure. JobTetris lets you track your job applications throughout their lifecycle, tailor your Resume and Cover letters using AI as well as providing real-time feedback on the status of your job applications, directly from Recruitment Agencies and Employers. With JobTetris your data is always secure, we'll reach out to you when an organisation requests access to your profile data and notify you when your data is accessed.
